```{r}
df<-read.table("../old_version/heatmap.txt",header = T)
df.prop<-prop.table(as.matrix(df[,-1]),2)*100

# Pearson's Chi-squared test
# 
# data:  df.prop
# X-squared = 186.61, df = 50, p-value < 2.2e-16
chisq.test(df.prop)

chisq.test(df[,-1])
```
